alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 1:04PM CDT until March 30 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... Morehouse Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Richland Parish in northeastern Louisiana... West Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northeastern Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 104 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Moro Bay State Park to near Sterlington to 12 miles northwest of Clarks, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Bastrop around 120 PM CDT. Buckner and Beekman around 130 PM CDT. Alto and Galion around 135 PM CDT. Mangham, Start and Archibald around 140 PM CDT. Rayville and Jones around 145 PM CDT. Wilmot and Holly Ridge around 150 PM CDT. Parkdale around 155 PM CDT. Delhi and Warden around 200 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Baskin, Collinston, Mer Rouge, Pioneer, Bonita, Oak Ridge and Epps. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
